mapper.sql: id, route_id, appointment_uid, appointment_date, depart_time, depart_id, state, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date
mapper.select:
SELECT bra.id, bra.appointment_uid, bra.appointment_date, bra.route_id, br.car_number, br.car_type, br.capacity, br.driver_uid, br.start_address, br.end_address, br.plan_depart_time, bra.state FROM bus_route_appointment bra, bus_route br where bra.route_id = br.id
and bra.appointment_uid = #{routeAppointment.appointmentUid}
and bra.appointment_date = date_format(#{routeAppointment.appointmentDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and bra.state = #{routeAppointment.state}
and br.car_number like concat("%",#{routeAppointment.carNumber}, "%")
and br.start_address like concat("%", #{routeAppointment.startAddress}, "%")
and br.end_address like concat("%", #{routeAppointment.endAddress}, "%")
order by bra.appointment_date desc

SELECT bra.id, bra.appointment_uid, bra.appointment_date, bra.route_id, br.car_number, br.car_type, br.capacity, br.driver_uid, br.start_address, br.end_address, br.plan_depart_time, bra.state FROM bus_route_appointment bra, bus_route br where bra.route_id = br.id and bra.id = #{id}
